name: Photoinitiators Platform
legal: Awaiting registration with the Belgian authorities as an AiSBL
goal: Our remit is (i) to represent the interests of the industry in the framework of regulation and policy-making affecting photoinitiators worldwide, (ii) to develop and strengthen a network and relations primarily with the European Institutions and Regulatory Agencies and other strategic partners and stakeholders  as regards photoinitiators and (iii) to actively educate on the properties and benefits of photoinitiators and promote their safe use.
euInitiatives:
Chemical legislation, including REACH
Food contact legislation
Consumer protection
Tariffs
